title: Test JAR should not be deployed to Central during releases
description:
c9807b9 added the test JAR to the maven-jar-plugin configuration for the OSGi integration tests. As a side effect, the test JAR was deployed starting from version 3.17.2.

We should prevent the test JAR from being deployed during releases.
